systems.name: Internet Banking System
systems.description: Allows customers to view information about their bank accounts, and make payments.

containers.name: Web Application
containers.description:
Delivers the static content and the
Internet banking single page application.

data.chart:
sequenceDiagram
    participant User as Customer
    participant WA as Web Application
    participant SPA as Single-Page Application
    participant API as API Application
    participant DB as Database

    User->>WA: Accesses banking site
    WA->>SPA: Loads Single-Page Application
    User->>SPA: Enters login details
    SPA->>API: Sends login request with credentials
    API->>DB: Verifies credentials
    DB-->>API: Returns verification result
    API-->>SPA: Sends login response (success/fail)
    User->>SPA: Requests account details
    SPA->>API: Fetches account details for user
    API->>DB: Retrieves account details
    DB-->>API: Returns account details
    API-->>SPA: Displays account details
    User->>SPA: Views account details

containers.name: Single-Page Application
containers.description: Provides all of the Internet banking functionality to customers via their web browser.

containers.name: Mobile App
containers.description: Provides a limited subset of the Internet banking functionality to customers via their mobile device.

containers.name: API Application
containers.description: Provides Internet banking functionality via a JSON/HTTPS API.

containers.name: Database
containers.description: Stores user registration information, hashed authentication credentials, access logs, etc.

systems.name: Mainframe Banking System
systems.description: Stores all of the core banking information about customers, accounts, transactions, etc.

containers.name: XML API
containers.description: Provides an API interface into the mainframe

systems.name: E-mail System
systems.description: The internal Microsoft Exchange e-mail system.

containers.name: SMTP Server
containers.description: The server is responsible for sending emails.

systems.name: Personal Banking Customers
systems.description: Views account balances, and makes payments using

containers.name: Web Customer
containers.description: A customer of the bank, with personal bank accounts.

containers.name: Mobile Customer
containers.description: A customer of the bank, with personal bank accounts.
